subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Travis Hafner, hitting .345 with 22 runs batted in, will miss at least three weeks with a strained oblique muscle, placing him on the disabled list with Grady Sizemore.
snippet: Travis Hafner, hitting .345 with 22 runs batted in, will miss at least three weeks with a strained oblique muscle, placing him on the disabled list with Grady Sizemore.
